info.name: Smart Technologies Bangladesh B2C API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection for Smart Technologies Bangladesh B2C backend application. This collection includes all documented endpoints with proper authentication, examples, and test scripts.

## Status Notes:
- ‚úÖ Working endpoints: Authentication and system endpoints
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Partially working endpoints: Business logic endpoints (products, orders, etc.) - experiencing 500 errors due to Redis/database connectivity issues
- üîß Infrastructure issues: Redis and database connectivity problems

## Environment Setup:
1. Create environment with variables: baseUrl, jwtToken, sessionId, userId, productId, categoryId, brandId, cartId, orderId, wishlistId
2. Set baseUrl to http://localhost:3001 for development
3. Use authentication endpoints to get jwtToken and sessionId

item.name: üîê Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and token management

request.description: Register a new user with email and phone verification

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Login user with email/phone and password
Logout user from current device or all devices
Refresh JWT token using refresh token
Verify email address with verification token
Send OTP to phone number for verification
Get supported mobile operators in Bangladesh
Refresh session from remember me token

item.name: üë• User Management
item.description: User profile and account management endpoints
